article: Newly elected committee of Shree Sunama Jakini Maatha Temple Trust is inviting members and devotess to attend a meeting on Dec 18th at 10AM at temple. This is to seek suggestions and plan for the upcoming annual celebration to be held on 25-26th Jan 2018

header: Official Website of Sunama Jakini Maatha
article: 4G Labs is happy to announce the launch of the new website for Shree Sunama Jakini Maatha Temple. Click here to access the website
